post.title: It's been **UPDATE: TWO DAYS** since "Free speech and Calls to Violence." The mods of +WhiteVictimsofBlackCrime are still banned. Who if anyone has been unbanned?

body:
No it doesn't.

>Accordingly, those bans will be reversed.

It says they will, eventually. It doesn't even say that they have, let alone bothering to give any confirmation of doing so, or even bothering to say who was banned and unbanned in the first place.
body_html:
No it doesn't.

Accordingly, those bans will be reversed.

It says they will, eventually. It doesn't even say that they have, let alone bothering to give any confirmation of doing so, or even bothering to say who was banned and unbanned in the first place.
